actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A resolution to encourage the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to centralize certain responsibilities and functions.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) shall take necessary action to assure that all responsibility for overall planning, coordination, and control, including quality assurance, reliability, and safety, of NASA programs is vested in and exercised by NASA Headquarters.

titles.title: A resolution to encourage the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to centralize certain responsibilities and functions.
